item.title: Kafka Streams - WIP
item.description: Stream is unbound flow of data (call it message, event or log). The Streams API of Apache KafkaÂ®, available through a Java library, can be used to build highly scalable, elastic, fault-tolerant, distributed applications and microservices. First and foremost, the Kafka Streams API allows you to create real-time applications that power your core business. It is the easiest yet the most powerful technology to process data stored in Kafka.

item.title: Introduction: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate (WIP)
item.description: Exam structure There are 65 questions within the exam and are multiple-choice requiring you to select either a single or multiple answers for each question The scoring is based out of 1000, with a minimum passing score of 720 (72%) You get 130 minutes to answer these questions. The exam is split into 4 different domains that you will be assessed against, each carrying a different percentage weighting, these are identified as:
